original_title: Apollo 17, on the Shoulders of Giants
overview: A documentary about the Apollo 17 mission to the Taurus-Littrow on the moon, the final lunar landing mission in the Apollo program, December 1972. Produced by A-V Corporation for NASA. The film was distributed both as an ephemeral film (shown to an audience via a 16mm film projector), and was also shown on TV (and was shown on both public and commercial stations per a search of vintage newspapers).
tagline: Apollo 17 mission to the moon, December 1972
title: Apollo 17, on the Shoulders of Giants
